name: City Builder (itch) (PhilDoesGamesGood)
description:
Welcome to your new city!

You need to make money, starting only with 50$ build structures to increase your population and income per month. 

Every great mayor gets a statue erected in their town, show your city whose in charge and get the statue built in the fastest time possible and compete for the highest scores in the leaderboards.

This game was created as part of the SUGAR game jam.

Stats are only saved when the game is completed and restarted. 

Use the arrow keys to move the camera (it does not lock yet so be careful not to get disorientated
